rear.descriptor: Ork Pilot, 2-4 Grot Riggers, 1-2 Grot Gunners

crew.notes: Ork Pilot, 2-4 Grot Riggers, 1-2 Grot Gunners

system.weapons:
Pilot: 4 Big Shootas (Front, Range 400m (4 AU), S/3/10, 1d10+6 I, Pen 4, Clip 1000, Reload -, Inaccurate, Unreliable

Grot Gunner: Bigga Big Shoota Turret (Left/Right/Rear, Range 400m (4 AU), S/3/10, 2d10+10 I, Pen 5, Clip 1000, Reload -, Inaccurate, Unreliable, Twin-Linked)
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft, but can only act as Flyer in Atmosphere. Pilot can fire all Pilot Weapons simultaneously, rolling once for all Big Shootas, dealing 3d10+20 Damage with Pen 4. Bomb Payloads can't accurately hit small targets like individuals or vehicles, estimate damage of 5d10+5 E, Pen 1d10, Blast 12. Acts as both a Fighter and a Bomber, has Craft Rating of +8 (Fighta) or +5 (Bomma) and squadron size of 25 for Attack Craft Purposes. Can only acquire if allied with Ork Freebooters.
